Welcome to normtest's documentation!
====================================


.. |cup_coffee| unicode:: U+2615

**normtest** is a Python library developed to help scientists evaluate their experimental data. 

.. admonition:: |cup_coffee|

   This project is under active development.


|

**Latast version**: ``0.0.1``

|
